dstm2.factory

Class ClassLoader<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • dstm2.factory.ClassLoader<T>

  • public class ClassLoader<T>
extends java.lang.ClassLoader
    Simple classloader used to turn BCEL-generated classes into Java classes.
